name: DCA License Counts
description: This data set features businesses/individuals holding a DCA license so that they may legally operate in New York City. Note: Sightseeing guides and temporary street fair vendors are not included in this data set.
agency: Department of Consumer and Worker Protection (DCWP)
attribution: Department of Consumer and Worker Protection (DCWP)

columns.description: Indicates whether the license is issued to an individual or an organization.
The NYC Community District where the business is located.
The NYC City Council District where the business is located.
The Building Identification Number where the business is located.
The Borough-Block-Lot number where the business is located.
The 2010 Census Tract where the business is located.
The latitudinal coordinate where the business is located.
The longitudinal coordinate where the business is located.
